EmailTemplate.name: DUC Approval Requested-Sales
EmailTemplate.subject: DUC Approval is being requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
** ATTENTION –ACTION NEEDED **<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
The Work Request Form just submitted has indicated the need for Data Use Committee approval. Per Corporate Policy, please proceed to http://sharepoint/home/CorporateCompliance1/DUR/Forms/MyItems.aspx and complete the appropriate form where you will find a link to the Data Use Committee calendar and the mechanism for submitting your form for review.
· Once approved, the WRF will be flagged as approved and an approval date will be populated.
· Approval emails generated from the DUC will be attached to the WRF.
· An email will be forwarded to you and production indicating the approval status.
· Should your request get denied or modifications are needed, please make the appropriate adjustments to the WRF to give direction to production on next steps needed.
Link to WRF: {!WorkRequestForm__c.Link}
